headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  DOCHERTY, HELEN A.

snippet: DOCHERTY--Helen A.,84, died March 7, 2016. She leaves two sisters, Mary Kumpey and Kathleen Foley. Helen graduated from Ascension High School in Worcester, earned her Bachelor's degree from Emmanuel College in Boston, earned her Master's degree from Boston College and earned her Ph.D. at the University of Wisconsin. She was a professor at the City College of New York for many years before retiring fifteen years ago. After retiring, Helen was a private practice Psychologist in New York City. A 10am Funeral Mass on March 10, 2016, in St. George's Church in Worcester. Burial will follow at St. John's Cemetery. In lieu of flowers, donations may be made to the Alzheimer's Association of MA/NH Chapter, 480 Pleasant St., Watertown, MA 02472. www.milesfuneral home.com. 1/3
